note.p: Career: Joined the Royal Engineers; served in Chatham (1847-1849), Woolwich (1849-1850) and Nova Scotia (1850-1854); served with the Ordnance Survey of Great Britain (1854-1858); served in British Columbia (1858-1863); Captain (1862); Rejoined the Ordnance Survey (1866-1879); Major (1872); Lieutenant Colonel (1873); Colonel (1878); retired (1879)
